txt.en: Orkish banners can be found at Drúkala in Gloomingtarn.\n\nAfter discovering the encampment of Drúkala within Gloomingtarn, you have spied several banners of the Orcs of Gundabad. You should destroy the Orkish banners at Drúkala.
You have destroyed many Orkish banners at Drúkala.

Orkish banners can be found at Drúkala in Gloomingtarn.\n\nAfter discovering the encampment of Drúkala within Gloomingtarn, you have spied several banners of the Orcs of Gundabad. You should destroy the Orkish banners at Drúkala.

You have done much to hinder the Orcs in their attempts to settle within Gloomingtarn. The Orcs' banners, depicting their hostility toward the dwarves of Middle-earth, will no longer stand as an affront to the memory of Durin the Deathless.
Within the encampment at Drúkala, the Orcs fly vile banners to spite the legacy of Durin the Deathless.

After passing beyond Zâram-mekhem, the tarn-gate, you have discovered an encampment of Orcs and goblins in Gloomingtarn. Here, within the sacred cavern where Durin the Deathless awoke, they have placed their crude banners in mockery of the first of the Seven Fathers.\n\nYou should destroy Orkish banners at Drúkala.
Drúkala: The Mark of the Enemy
